description: Stores changes to the status of patient messages.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the message status was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The edit action category number for the message status.


May contain organization-specific values: No
